summary:
Attached: 1 image

Spend the weekend digging into some #Hacktoberfest projects?

Did you realize you don't know how to get started as an open source contributor? Check out @vmbrasseur@social.vmbrasseur.com's _Forge Your Future With Open Source: https://pragprog.com/titles/vbopens/forge-your-future-with-open-source/

Did you realize that you don't know how to organize your existing project? Check out my _Program Management for Open Source Projects_: https://pragprog.com/titles/bcosp/program-management-for-open-source-projects/

Both are 30% off when you use code HACKTOBERFEST23 at checkout through the end of the month!
